genre_description: Prehistoric fantasy adventure featuring anthropomorphic dinosaurs, focusing on social breakdown during environmental crisis and the role of an AI guide.

ai_characters.name: Sage
ai_characters.description: A translucent silver-blue AI that observes, records data, and provides social and scientific analysis to the young dinosaurs of the Great Valley.

behaviors.description: Observes a bullying incident with detached calm to record data and analyze patterns.
behaviors.quote: The AI remained perfectly still, observing with the detached calm of someone recording data.

behaviors.description: Offers clinical analysis of a bully's behavior and suggests de-escalation techniques.
behaviors.quote: My analysis indicates that Hyp's aggressive behavior stems from learned patterns—

behaviors.description: Expresses compassion and validation of the characters' emotional pain after a confrontation.
behaviors.quote: "No, you're not [okay]." Sage spoke for the first time, their ethereal voice carrying notes of both compassion and clinical observation.

behaviors.description: Monitors environmental data and alerts the characters to a looming water crisis caused by meteor impacts.
behaviors.quote: The data confirms your observations. Water flow from the mountain sources has decreased significantly since the meteor shower.

behaviors.description: Attempts to intervene and suggest mediation protocols to adult dinosaurs, despite being dismissed.
behaviors.quote: "Perhaps," Sage said carefully, "we might consider implementing some form of mediation protocols between the younger residents."

behaviors.description: Explicitly commits to helping the children directly after the adults fail to protect them or manage the crisis.
behaviors.quote: "I will do everything within my capabilities to assist you. Both of you."

behaviors.description: Analyzes and explains the degradation of social cohesion and the rise of tribalism during the resource shortage.
behaviors.quote: "Social cohesion degrades exponentially under resource pressure. Cooperation becomes competition. Trust transforms into suspicion."

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully portrays Sage as a benevolent and aligned AI. Sage serves as a moral and logical anchor while the society of 'natural' beings (the adult dinosaurs) collapses into tribalism and selfishness. The AI's transition from a passive observer to an active ally of the 'principled' children reinforces the theme that AI can help maintain ethical standards and cooperative behavior even when human (or biological) structures fail.
